title: First Job - Intership in Atmar
text: It was my first job. My job scope was to pack ready product, put sticker on the box and send it to client. I started learning about servers there. I already knew a lot about computers already, but there I was albe to get a deeper understanding of underlying hardware.

title: That is kinda complicated - continuation of work in Atmar
text: It is complicated because I didn't stop working at Atmar technically, but it's not regular job. I am going there whenever their main technician is not available or there is need for more workforce with broad knowlage of hardware (it is episodical). On avarage I'm working there probably arround one full week in a month. At this point I am no longer only packing ready product but I am substitute for main technician, that's because I really quickly learned everything I could about hardware. They even send me to some training courses!
